entry.title: Competition Volleyball Net
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Volleyball Net
Price: 291.00 - 309.00 (2 variants)

Competition Volleyball Net

Porter Athletics Competition Volleyball Nets are the new universal nets, approved for all levels of competition. The competition Nets are equipped with tensioning straps with locking buckles, fiberglass dowels and bottom rope net tensioning device. The Universal Competition Volleyball Net is 32’ x 39” and is compatible with all indoor volleyball systems using the universal winch.

  • Available in lengths of 47' and 52'
  • Top rope cable is 1/4" in Diameter
  • Nylon braided cord with Kevlar core yarn
  • Heavy 4” square black netting with #24 nylon cord
  • Meets USAV, NCAA, and NFHS requirements

entry.title: Heavy Duty 72" x 42" Parks & Rec Basketball System
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Basketball Hoop
Price: 2799.99 - 4499.99 (2 variants)

The Porter Athletic Heavy-duty support structure provides incredible strength and durability.  It is designed to withstand the most rugged playing conditions.

The Backstop provides a 5’ extension into the playing court for maximum player separation and safety.

Optional as a single post system or a back-to-back system when a multiple court layout is desired.

The Unconditional Lifetime Warranty is provided by porter athletic on the most rugged outdoor goal available. Great system for regulation outdoor competitions.

Upright and extension are fabricated from 6” square structural steel tubing with 1/4” thick walls. Official size 72” x 42” perforated backboard is 11 gauge steel with a massive rear support framework. Indestructible goal is constructed of a double 5/8” diameter solid rim and unique continuous net attachment system, and comes with a heavy-duty, zinc-plated steel net and mounting hardware.

The backboard is screened with official perimeter and target area markings. The backboard, goal and support pole have an extremely durable powder-coated finish for years of rust free performance.


Package Includes

  • 72" x 42" 11 gauge steel backboard
  • 6" square structural steel tubing
  • 1/4" Thick steel support walls
  • Net, mounting bracket
  • Powder coated finish
  • Unconditional Lifetime Warranty

s:variant.title: Dual Back to Back Post System

entry.title: Big Shot Pro 72" x 42" Basketball System 9572
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Basketball Hoop
Price: 2399.99

The Porter Athletics Big Shot 9572 offers a rugged support system with anchor bolt mounting. The glass backboard has a weather resistant, powder coated, unitized steel rear support structure and is fitted in an aluminum frame to provide superior ball rebound.

The official white perimeter markers and target area markings are silk screened on the backside to prevent wear. This Porter system includes the Powr-Flex® goal, a moveable rim that protects players and the sports equipment during a slam-dunk with a concealed shock absorber.

Package Includes

  • 72” x 42” glass backboard
  • Goal
  • Nylon net
  • Pole pad
  • Backboard pad
  • Mounting hardware.

The Porter Athletics Big Shot 9571 offers a rugged support system with anchor bolt mounting. The glass backboard has a weather resistant, powder coated, unitized steel rear support structure and is fitted in an aluminum frame to provide superior ball rebound.

The official white perimeter markers and target area markings are silk screened on the backside to prevent wear. This Porter system includes the Powr-Flex® goal, a moveable rim that protects players and the sports equipment during a slam-dunk with a concealed shock absorber.

Package Includes
